content.rendered:
Vgloves Nitrile Gloves from Vietnam
Medical gloves from Vietnam with 100% high quality
Nitrile Examination Gloves that is highly appreciated for its hygienic nature, fine finish, durability, skin friendly nature, perfect grip and durability. Useful for various applications in medical sector, hospitals, laboratories, food industry, saloons, spas and automobile industry, we offer these Nitrile Examination Gloves
Packaging :Vacuum Sealed Sterile Pouches Packed in Corrugated Boxes
100 pcs/ box, 10 boxes/ carton , 3600 carton/ cont 40HC
STANDARDS: CE certificate, FDA certificate, ISO 9001:2015, ISO 13485:2016 & EN ISO 13485:2016, ISO 22000:2005, SA 8000:2014, GMP certificate
MATERIAL: nitrile or latex
MADE IN: Vietnam
LOCATED IN: Amsterdam , Netherlands
